list_definition.definition: what can be seen (of a person, thing etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: From his appearance, he seemed very wealthy.

list_definition.definition: the act of coming into view or coming into a place

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The thieves ran off at the sudden appearance of two policemen.

list_definition.mean_english: sự xuất hiện trước công chúng
list_definition.definition: the act of coming before or presenting oneself/itself before the public or a judge etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: This will be his first appearance on the stage as a professional actor.
